document.full_text: the mother of detained chinese artist-activist ai weiwei said wednesday she feared the government was preparing to prosecute him for his criticism of the state, while a chinese newspaper attacked western governments for urging his release.
document.title: detained chinese artist's mother says he may face prosecution
lines_and_colors: the mother of detained chinese artist-activist ai weiwei said wednesday she feared the government was preparing to prosecute him for his criticism of the state, while a chinese newspaper attacked western governments for urging his release.
